message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $130, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $110? That's the lowest I can go.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $125, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you think about it and come back with a new offer?
